person.persName: Benjamin C. Allin (Mercer County, Kentucky, circuit clerk)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, circuit clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Susan H. Allen. Father of Kate Allen, Phillip T. Allen, Bushrod W. Allen, William B. Allen, Susan J. Allen, Grant Allen, Mary D. Allen, and Thomas Allen. Clerk of Mercer Circuit Court in Mercer County in 1861. Owned seven enslaved persons in Mercer County in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Mercer County in 1860.
